# modal-window

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                                    | Type      | Default     |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ---------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `title`         | `title`          | set Modal title                                | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `confirmText`   | `confirm-text`   | set confirm/okay button text                   | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `cancelText`    | `cancel-text`    | set cancel button text                         | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `pointerEvents` | `pointer-events` | set pointer events when modal-window is active | `boolean` | `undefined` |

-This component accept content to modal-window via slots.
-This component is responsive for screens below 576px

_Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)_
